data.name: lb_EnviarCodigo

data.name: mb_AyudaDificultad
data.value:
The difference between the difficulties is the amount of stairs and snakes: Easy: 6 ladders and 3 snakes. Normal: 4 ladders and 4 snakes. Hard: 3 ladders and 6 snakes.
The game starts when there are 4 players. At the start of the game you will bet 200 points.

data.name: mb_AyudaPartida
data.value: 1.- Each player has 10 seconds to make his shot. 2.- Your token and your turn are in the upper right corner. 3.- When it's your turn, press the dice to roll and it will show how much you got to the right of the dice. 4.- If a player does not roll he loses his turn. 5.- In the chat you can send message to the other players, in addition to receiving feedback from the game. 6.- You can only leave the game when it is the turn of the other players. If you decide to leave the game you will lose automatically and you will not receive any prize points. 7.- The ladders make you go up to the position where they end and the snakes make you go down to the position where they end. 8.- There are 4 bonus positions on the board, when you are in some place you will throw again and the different bonuses will appear in the chat, each round the bonus will change the position. 9.- To win you have to EXACTLY reach 100, if your shot goes over 100 your token will return. 10.- The game ends when a player reaches box 100, and the ranking will be assigned from the highest to the lowest position of the players. In case of a tie in any position, the game will assign the positions in the ranking of the game.

data.name: mb_AyudaUnirse
data.value: To join a game you must select a game from the table and click on the Join button, and it will take you to the waiting screen. The game starts when there are 4 players. At the start of the game you will bet 200 points.

data.name: mb_TerminosCondiciones
data.value:
TERMS OF SERVICE Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our game. By accessing or using any part of the game, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you cannot use our game. You may not use our game for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may, in the use of the game, violate any law in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws). You must not transmit any worms, viruses or any code of a destructive nature. A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your account. We reserve the right to refuse to provide the service to any person for any reason and at any time. We reserve the right at any time to modify or interrupt the game (or any part or content thereof) without prior notice at any time.
PRIVACY POLICY Snakes and Ladders, is responsible for the processing of personal data you provide. Your personal data will be used for the following purposes: a) Register your game registration; b) generate player lists; c) establish communication to follow up or clarify doubts about your data, notification of banning; and e) generate statistics. Additionally, we will use your personal information for the following purposes that are not necessary, but that allow and facilitate us to provide you with better service: a) invitations to future events. When you register we collect the personal information you give us, such as your name and email address. When you play, we also automatically receive the address of the Internet Protocol (IP) team in order to provide us with information that helps us connect with more players. Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we can send you emails about our game, new products and other updates. When you provide us with personal information to complete your registration it implies that you accept our privacy policy.

data.name: ms_AceptarTerminos
data.value: You must agree to Terms and conditions.

data.name: ms_Bonus
data.value: is in a bonus position, throw again. Bonus: 1.- Back to start 2.- Divide your position in half 3.- Back 3 positions 4.- Earn 50 points 5.- Move 10 positions 6.- Go to 90 position

data.name: ms_Mensaje
data.value:
Do not share this code with anyone it is necessary to verify your account in Serpientes y Escaleras.

Thanks for playing with us!
